articles.title: Pure Storage pwned, claims data plundered by crims who broke into Snowflake workspace - The Register
articles.description: Secure storage company hasn't spilled details on how they got in
articles.content:
Pure Storage is the latest company to confirm it's a victim of mounting Snowflake-related data breaches.
